channel.title: Media Page Broken
channel.description:
Hey, guys.
I noticed a bug with the Media page. While it works very well when visiting from [url='https://release.blackmesasource.com/']your homepage[/url] in that it is properly embedded therein, it does not have any functionality when visiting it externally.
The URL from the front page is as follows: [url]https://release.blackmesasource.com/pages/media.html[/url]
This page has no formatting to it, and the embedded images fail to load (likely due to permission errors; we aren't supposed to get there). I am sure there are many other users that like to open links in another tab or window, so it is a fairly apparent issue.
Interestingly enough, however, the Media link from [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/']your forum[/url] is [u]different[/u] than the above link from your front page: [url]https://www.blackmesasource.com/media.html[/url]
Unlike the former link, this page completely fails to load.
I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions.
